item.title: 虽然绝大多数退休人员都选择缩小规模，但也有一些空巢老人认为越大越好。以下是在决定永久居所的大小时需要考虑的因素。
item.description: While a vast majority of retirees choose to downsize, some empty-nesters think bigger is better. Here’s what to consider when deciding on the size of your forever home. on.wsj.com/3OTvYNJ on.wsj.com/3OTvYNJ

item.title: 这看起来像是莫斯科的胜利：一个爱国的乌克兰少年成了俄罗斯宣传的代言人。他的家人为把他找回来所做的努力暴露了更黑暗的现实。
item.description: It looked like a triumph for Moscow: A patriotic Ukrainian teen became a face of Russian propaganda. His family's campaign to get him back exposed a darker reality. on.wsj.com/3ORO8iO on.wsj.com/3ORO8iO

item.title: 回顾：Netflix 的系列纪录片《一级方程式赛车：以刘易斯-汉密尔顿（Lewis Hamilton）和马克斯-维斯塔潘（Max Verstappen）等明星车手为主角的系列纪录片《一级方程式：驰骋求生》依然是一部充满推动力、信息丰富的娱乐片

item.title: 哈佛大学教授塔里克-马苏德（Tarek Masoud）写道，大多数哈佛学生都渴望就有争议的问题展开公开辩论，但管理者却畏首畏尾，无法做到这一点。
item.description: Most Harvard students are eager for open debate on controversial issues, writes Harvard professor Tarek Masoud, but administrators are too timid to make it possible. on.wsj.com/3T8U0Xt on.wsj.com/3T8U0Xt

item.title: 耶鲁大学在过去四年中一直没有要求学生提交标准化考试成绩，此次将再次要求学生提交标准化考试成绩
item.description: Yale will once again require prospective students to submit standardized test scores after making tests optional for the past four years on.wsj.com/49Kr7q5 on.wsj.com/49Kr7q5

item.title: 大约一半的大学毕业生最终从事的工作并不需要他们的学位。"你的一生都被告知，'去上大学，拿到学士学位，之后的生活就会很美好'"。
item.description: Roughly half of college graduates end up in jobs where their degrees aren’t needed. “You're told your entire life, ‘Go to college, get a bachelor's degree and your life is gonna be gravy after that.’” on.wsj.com/49oPD0i on.wsj.com/49oPD0i

item.title: 本季最令人惊奇的新烹饪书没有食谱，读起来像苏斯博士，实际上能帮你成为一名更好的厨师

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：反对派领袖纳瓦尔尼遇害后，白宫承诺对俄罗斯实施严厉的新制裁，但拜登是否愿意没收俄罗斯的主权资产并将其转移到乌克兰，将是对制裁是否严肃的考验
item.description: From @WSJopinion: The White House is promising tough new sanctions on Russia after the murder of opposition leader Navalny, but the test of seriousness will be whether Biden is willing to seize Russia’s sovereign assets and transfer them to Ukraine on.wsj.com/3IcycnH

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的家人与拜登总统会面，向俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京施加更大压力，为这位克里姆林宫批评家之死伸张正义
item.description: Alexei Navalny’s family met with President Biden to step up pressure on Russian President Vladimir Putin, as they seek justice for the Kremlin critic's death on.wsj.com/49ECxw9 on.wsj.com/49ECxw9

item.title: 希拉里-斯万克（Hilary Swank）仍然沿着洛杉矶的街道开车，她和她的母亲曾经在这条街上停车和睡觉。"尽管挑战重重，我还是怀念那些日子，我们一无所有"
item.description: Hilary Swank still drives along the L.A. street where she and her mom used to park and sleep. "Despite the challenges, I feel nostalgia for those days, when we had nothing." on.wsj.com/3wkbEi5 on.wsj.com/3wkbEi5

item.title: Capital One 与 Discover 的交易旨在打造维萨卡和万事达卡更大的竞争对手。以下是消费者和商家需要了解的信息。
item.description: The Capital One-Discover deal aims to create a bigger competitor to Visa and Mastercard. Here’s what consumers and merchants need to know. on.wsj.com/3OQ66Cg on.wsj.com/3OQ66Cg

item.title: 金-卡戴珊：好莱坞》（Kim Kardashian: Hollywood）即将下架，这让这款手机游戏的死忠粉大为恼火，有些人花光了辛苦赚来的虚拟现金，还打算欺骗自己的虚拟丈夫。
item.description: The pending demise of “Kim Kardashian: Hollywood” has die-hard fans of the mobile game in a tizzy, with some spending all their hard-earned virtual cash and planning to cheat on their virtual husbands. on.wsj.com/3T3DmIU on.wsj.com/3T3DmIU

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）在拉斯维加斯举办巡回演唱会所带来的经济影响至少在一个方面被超级碗比赛所超越：大型比赛对该地区短租市场的收入影响更大。
item.description: The financial impact of Taylor Swift’s tour in Las Vegas was edged out by the Super Bowl in at least one area: The big game had a bigger revenue impact on the area's short-term rental market. on.wsj.com/3UIpG7m on.wsj.com/3UIpG7m

item.title: 不只是你。家电故障越来越多，维修费用也越来越高。
item.description: It’s not just you. Appliances are breaking down more and are more expensive to fix. on.wsj.com/3UIpAN2

item.title: 在医学从业者称之为流行病的今天，专注于社会联系的企业家在全国各地如雨后春笋般涌现。"我们的孤独感正在让我们生病"。
item.description: Entrepreneurs focused on social connection are popping up around the country amid what medical practitioners are calling an epidemic. “Our sense of loneliness is literally making us sick.” on.wsj.com/3uIBVGw on.wsj.com/3uIBVGw

item.title: 纽约市有 8000 多处人行道棚架，笼罩着纽约市的人行道，这是一个难以解决的问题
item.description: More than 8,000 sidewalk sheds—scaffolding—enshroud New York City’s sidewalks, and it’s a problem with no easy fix on.wsj.com/42JmGtn on.wsj.com/42JmGtn

item.title:
R to @WSJ：在各州就在线赌博合法化展开辩论时，各公司承诺对问题赌徒进行干预，但确保合规的法规却少之又少。
了解更多有关博彩应用程序如何让赌徒上瘾的信息：
item.description:
As states debated legalizing online gambling, companies promised to intervene with problem gamblers, but there are few regulations to ensure compliance.

Read more about how betting apps keep gamblers hooked: on.wsj.com/3SKr1b3 on.wsj.com/48qkeZS

item.title:
R to @WSJ：费舍尔曾多次申请禁止使用赌博应用程序，并在当地教堂参加了她的第一次 12 步戒赌会议。
一位小组成员告诉她不要再感到孤独。她哭了。
item.description:
Fischer applied multiple times to be banned from gambling apps and attended her first 12-step meeting for gamblers at a local church.

One group member told her not to feel lonely anymore. She cried. on.wsj.com/42OvIp0

item.title:
R to @WSJ：随着债务的增加，费舍尔花费了更多的时间和金钱试图摆脱困境。免费赠品给了她继续努力的理由。
美国顶级在线博彩公司 DraftKings 邀请她在一间提供食物和饮料的套房里观看一场 NFL 比赛。
item.description:
As her debts grew, Fischer spent more time and money trying to dig her way out. The freebies gave her a reason to keep trying.

DraftKings, one of America's top online-betting companies, invited her to watch an NFL game from a suite with food and drinks. on.wsj.com/42M3o6x
